      public BinOpAgent(String name, String input1, String input2, String output, BinaryOperator<Double> operation)
      Constructor for BinOpAgent
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the agent
      input1 - Name of the first input topic
      input2 - Name of the second input topic
      output - Name of the output topic
      operation - Binary operation to perform on the inputs
